channel.title: Help with batch pl0x?
channel.description:
Well i've currently been working with batch and am making a short maths trivia.
I want it so if you type 'continue' it clears the screen?
I've currently tried this.
[code] sep /p c=option: if %c%==continue goto continue echo very well then... echo. goto er :continue cls echo very well echo what is 6 X 9? echo.[/code] anyone?

Meh i’m trying my best, i’ll sned you what i’ve done and maybe we can both keep adding to it?

item.title: Help with batch pl0x?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

hey isnt that the math trivia i wrote?

@echo off
:co1
set b=0
set t=0
:co2
color 0f
:menu
title Logg in
cls
SET /P user=Username:
SET /P pass=Password:
echo.
echo type play to start.
set /p c=Option:
if %c%==play goto play
goto er
:play
title %user%
cls
echo.
echo Welcome to the trivia games!
echo the games include...
echo  Math
echo select one.
echo.
set /p c=Option:
if %c%==SS goto ss
if %c%==ss goto ss
if %c%==MATH goto math
if %c%==math goto math
if %c%==grammer goto grammer
if %c%==GRAMMER goto grammer
goto er
:math
title math trivia user - %user%
echo.
echo  2x2 = ?
echo.
set /p c=Option
if %c%==4 goto 4
goto er
:4
tite math trivia user - %user%
cls
echo CORRECT!
echo next question..
echo.
echo 6x5 = ?
echo.
set /p c=Option:
if %c%==30 goto 30
goto er
:30
title math trivia user - %user%
cls
echo CORRECT!
echo next question..
echo.
echo 8x8 = ?
echo.
set /p c=Option:
if %c%==64 goto 64
goto er
:64
title math trivia user - %user%
cls
echo CORRECT!
echo next question..
echo.
echo 12x12 = ?
echo.
set /p c=Option:
if %c%==144 goto 144
goto er
:144
title math trivia user - %user%
cls
echo CORRECT!
echo last question..
echo.
echo 120x120 = ?
echo.
set /p c=Option:
if %c%==14400goto 14400
:1440
title Math - complete by %user%
cls
echo type back to go back to the menu.
echo.
set /p c=Option:
if %c%==back goto play
goto er
:ss

Read full topic
